title: mystery URW font "Flammanion"
content:
I am looking for a font "Flammanion" which is a URW font included with the Gerber Omega CP software. I don't use Gerber software. I called Gerber, they were no help besides telling me that the font was not available for purchase as a TTF. They can not even send me a jpg/pdf to let me know what it looks like. Has anybody heard of this font? Is it similar to another font? I basically need the following letters in a vector format:

NAMASTE  
Namaste

It would probably be enough if I can see the font / these letters in an image file so I can match or rebuild. Any ideas anybody?
author: Waasi

comments.content:
It's not listed at the URW site which suggests it's probably one of their older clones. Unfortunately, I don't recognise the face, but here's what it looks like:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FlammanionSmp_4144.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013005052im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NamasteFlammanion_4795.jpg)

André

Yep, so it would appear. I know that some of their clones were distributed under a variety of names (presumably at some point they licensed the proper name from ITC and used 'Flammanion' prior to that).

André

agisaak, Bendy, you guys were tremendous help! I can't explain the amount of headaches you have just cured, but I can say it lasted for about 5 hours and it involved about 20 people at over 7 companies. Thank you so much!!!
